english.segment1: Its hard. To tell. if my eyes are open. when all i see is dark. and its easy. its easy. to lose my step. to lose my step
english.segment2: there is no fight left. on the inside. but maybe thats where i should be. ive given up trying. im giving it all to you.
english.segment3: and i used to dream. of a life so lovely. thered be no room for tears. now letting go. yeah letting go. is the hardest part its the hardest part
english.segment4: there is no fight left. on the inside. but maybe thats where i should be. ive given up trying. im giving it all to you.
english.segment5: There is no place i can go. where you don't already know. how to reach right down and pull me out. I need you I need you I neeed you
english.segment6: . there is no fight left. on the inside. but maybe thats where i should be. ive given up trying. im giving it all
english.segment7: there is no fight left. on the inside. but maybe thats where i should be. ive given up trying. im giving it all
english.segment8: ive given up trying. im giving it all
english.segment9: yeahive given up trying. im giving it all to you..
